artefact.overview: You need to register as a radiographer with the Health and Care Professions Council
artefact.licence_short_description: Register with the Health and Care Professions Council as a radiographer.
artefact.licence_overview:
To practise as a radiographer, you need to register with the [Health and Care Professions Council (HCPC).](http://www.hpc-uk.org/ "Health and Care Professions Council"){:rel="external"}

This includes using the protected titles:

* radiographer
* diagnostic radiographer
* therapeutic radiographer

*[HCPC]: Health and Care Professions Council
